posts.title: Front End Technology
posts.content:
The front end stack is made up of many different technologies and libraries .
while these vary from application to application.

posts.title: PHP
posts.content: PHP is a programming language that allows developers to create dynamic web applications with its content that can interact with databases and also a general purpose server side scripting language.

posts.title: Tandoori Chicken
posts.content: Crisp on the outside,soft and succulent on the inside,Tandoori Chicken is the mainstay of punjab cooking,with its roots firmly in the Mughal era.

posts.title: Panner Tikka
posts.content: Panner Tikka is one of the best starter in any popular indian restaurant it can also be served as a snack in Barbecues

posts.title: Kashmir
posts.content: sonmarg or sonamarg hill station in Ganderbal distict in the indian union territory of Jammu and kashmir about 80km north-east of shree nagar,sonmarg located at a hefty altitude 2,740meter above sea level
